name: Classpro.in
overview:
Classpro is a simple online software (SaaS) for coaching classes. Classpro was founded by Jayesh Gopalan, Deepak Dargade and Vijay Suryawanshi in March 2011 and backed by The Morpheus Startup Accelerator.

Jayesh Gopalan, Deepak Dargade and Vijay Suryawanshi used to run a coaching center named 3CCI (3 Cube Computer Institute) at Malad West (Mumbai) for BScIT students (now it has been shut down). Classpro was created for internal use at 3cci, but later it was made available to all coaching classes.

The very basic features of classpro includes:

  1. Student admissions and payments.
  2. Multiple center supports.
  3. Simple yet powerful reports.
  4. SMS integration for fees, exams and lectures.
  5. Parent communication with coaching center.
  6. Exam and Lecture.
  7. Website for coaching classes.
  8. Student/Parent Website Login Portal. and many more that makes it easy to manage a coaching class.
